[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/Scumfunk/yamusic.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/Scumfunk/yamusic)

# YaMusic
Yandex Music electron app with Macbooks's Touchbar and global shortcuts support (media buttons on your keyboard, taps on your AirPods, etc).
![](https://camo.githubusercontent.)

![Touchbar](https://camo.githubusercontent.)


Although it was developed for MacOS X, you can use it on Windows and Linux too!

# Install

## From binary

Just visit [releases page](https://github.com/Scumfunk/yamusic/releases) where you can find some builds. 

## From source
1. Clone this repo
```
git clone git@github.com:Scumfunk/yamusic.git
cd yamusic
```

2. Install dependencies
```
npm i
```

3. Build
```
npm run dist
```

4. Run binary/installer from ./dist/


NOTE: On MacOS X for global shortcuts binding you must grant access to YaMusic in System Preferences -> Security -> Accessibility
